entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LibraryImport with CLong produces SYSLIB1051 and requires disabling runtime marshalling #73975
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 and .NET Framework 4.8.1 return different value for `OSArchitecture` when running emulated as x86 #73974
  • Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 7.0.100 Preview 7 #73971
    Future
  • Consider obsoleting `RSA.EncryptValue`, `RSA.DecryptValue` #73969
    8.0.0
  • gcc ubsan reports pointer overflow in bitsetasshortlong perhaps a false positive #73964
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures only when trimming #73961
  • When I try to create a handler in the client for a gRPC service HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #73960
  • SignedXml. Ability to call SignedInfo verification or improve return type. #73959
    Future
  • [debugger] Test failure - DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestUncaughtWithReload #73957
  • ILASM roundtrip failure - `src/tests/readytorun/tests/mainv2` #73954
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT descriptor file doesnt generate warnings #73952
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on x86 for a function in collectible ALC #73951
    8.0.0
  • Open up internal JsonConfigurationFileParser to be public #73946
    Future
  • Visual Studio 2022 Remote Testing -.NET Framework 4.8 is installed, yet the.NET cannot be found during testing. #73940
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22413.1] When calling Socket.EndReceiveFrom method throws SocketException in .NET 7.0 but throws ObjectDisposedException in .NET 6.0 #73936
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 #73930
    7.0.0
  • ubsan failure when calling through pointer to member function #73927
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT needs to understand SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings #73926
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RandomAccess_GetLength.ReturnsActualLengthForDevices(options: Asynchronous) #73925
    Future

Closed

  • Invalid docker tag used on 7.0-preview5 testing #73162
  • [WINARM][Regression] Fail to run the command – dotnet test --framework net7.0 --arch x64/x86 --diag:log.txt #72988
  • [wasm] Perftracing build broken due to trimming errors #73933
    7.0.0
  • `MissingMethodException` created with class+method name constructor has incorrect HRESULT #73750
    Future
  • Custom EventSources in shared library seem to have unused code #54859
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark is internal #49866
    7.0.0
  • Reading of Decimal broken for binary XmlDictionaryReader #73934
  • Newbie help on debugging libraries: Looking for a working vscode+linux debug setup for libraries #72841
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up AOT Publishing #72415
    8.0.0
  • Regressions from "make SIP not on by default" #73784
    7.0.0
  • `ref` field support in .NET runtimes #63768
    7.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator tests failing on big-endian target (ref pointer type mismatch) #73775
    7.0.0
  • Change Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator to not use private reflection on XElement constructor #37970
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Test failures due to trimming errors on `main` #73932
    7.0.0
  • Reading application settings in NET WinForms OOP designer fails with exception 'Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed" #70318
    6.0.x
  • Separate Test Build & Test Run in Azure Pipelines #12475
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.CompilerServices #72408
    7.0.0
  • Source-build fails to build w/CS0208: Cannot take the address of, get the size of, or declare a pointer to a managed type #73850
    7.0.0
  • msbuild Publish fails with Error: Invalid directory size. #72425
    7.0.0
  • Add support for ILLink.Descriptors.xml #70810
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !PreemptiveGCDisabled() #70307
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] Unexpected performance degradation for Vector128<short> #73921
    7.0.0
  • review SubtleCrypto fallback scenarios #69741
    8.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Structs are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61146
    7.0.0
  • The memory usage of the Aspnetcore program in the container is very low, and the gc is too aggressive and affects the performance #69423
    Future
  • Implement full GC suspension #67805
    7.0.0
  • Slow SSL Authentication on Ubuntu 16.04 / 18.04 #27666
    7.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not respect the Keep-Alive header #72958
    6.0.x
  • ProcessNameMatchesScriptName fails intermittently with NativeAot #73928
  • System.Numerics work planned for .NET 7 #47244
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add readme about how to run the template #71047
    8.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler.MaxResponseHeadersLength can cause internal 32-bit overflow with HTTP/2 #73848
    7.0.0
  • The same asp.net core application runs on windows and linux, the workspace memory usage is doubled #72557
    7.0.0
  • SetEnvironmentVariable does not work properly on Unix #9529
    Future
  • Repoint URL's to docs from corefx to runtime repo #73682
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73977
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reenable HugeExpr Test on macOS ARM64 #73976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #73972
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #73970
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • fix formatting of arm/arm64 addresses #73967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back PreInitializedAttribute handling to NativeAOT #73966
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disable ILASM roundtrip for mainv2 test #73956
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement missing functionality for cctor invocation #73955
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Directory.CreateDirectory performance #73942
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Retry distributed transaction tests on MSDTC startup failure #73941
    area-System.Transactions
  • Add support for "known errors" to Fuzzlyn pipeline #73938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 6.0.9
  • Fix exceptions with missing HResult assignment #73948
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix finding the Python location if the %TEMP% path contains a space #72683
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add generation of structured object file dumps #73913
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 7 SDK #72145
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make public EventBookmark's constructor and BookmarkText property #73548
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for `<TrimmerRootDescriptor>` #73935
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update byref bool native exports #73950
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept for four values #73696
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Show address offsets in hex #73816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Reset current_no_gc_region_info after leaving no gc region implicitly #73806
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [mono] Remove active issues for https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/57506 #73492
    area-System.Security
  • Fix issue#37970 #73552
    area-Serialization
  • Disable MaxResponseHeadersLength tests for HTTP/3 #73945
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix breakage from #70661 #73962
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept in RegexCompiler and source generator #73910
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Make OCSP Stapling tests more reliable and more diagnosable #73632
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "supportsDebuggerProperties" from DAP #71148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix unnecessary failure when Crossgen'ing dll's without proper Debug Directory data #73824
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET, 7.0.0
  • Filter out Tailscale from LinkLocal address list #73911
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Block intermittently failing Process test #73929
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templates and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify MaxResponseHeadersLength calculations #73907
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix handling of corrupted state exceptions on Windows #73889
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • Add intrinsic for SpanHelpers.Char.IndexOfAny on AArch64 #73788
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the tests' building on LA64. #73840
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Implement validation mode in R2RDump #1955
  • Reproducible and verifiable NativeAOT builds #1632

PullRequests

Created

  • Validation for RuntimeFunctions and change to unwindinfo #1960

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_NULLCHECK #1871

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK causes Segmentation Faults whenever I run essential cli commands. #27174

Closed

  • dotnet restore: Slow restore performance #18467
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed on docker #27094
  • dotnet pack arguments not splitting on semicolon #27177
  • Package validators might enqueue identical work items #25989
  • Package validation Baseline Package Validator should optionally check semantic versioning rules #24781
  • Feed implementation assemblies instead of their directories to ApiCompat #23631
  • Starting with DotNet Core 6.0.303 the -p option does NOT accept multiple parameters #27175
  • sdk 6.0.400 breaks WPF projects with source generators #27173
  • Add tests for each validator #17368
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't calculate package path manually #27181
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Lock net5 sdk packages #27179
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Port pre-download changes into the 6.0.4xx branch #27178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle InvalidDataException when trying to write to cache and then read #27171
    Area-ReadyToRun

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Corresponding PublishAOT changes to match the runtime cleanup changes #27159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parser for actual MSBuild Property option syntax #27086
    Bug, Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 6.0.401
  • Support custom rule settings, improve testability #27138
    Area-ApiCompat
  • `dotnet-new`: dotnet post-actions are moved to `dotnet` project #27039
  • [dotnet new] telemetry for MSBuild evaluation #27042
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix for --print-download-link only #27064
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27071
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • .NET 6 Fix .NET MAUI Blazor Scoped CSS Hot Reload #27108
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.4xx
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean-up rules (styling) and make CompatDifference a readonly struct #27155
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions`; removed duplicate code in templating #27132

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [semi-auto-props]: Revise spec regarding `set;` #6089
  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor / remove RunTests #63413
  • SyntaxGenerator crashes with 'checked' operators #63410
    C# 12.0
  • LSIF tool backward incompatibility #63409
  • CS4033 creates invalid code on partial methods #63404
  • Hot Reload doesn't work if Razor class library has a view with the same name as the web app #63399
    17.4

Closed

  • Interfaces don't forward static members to other interfaces #62855
    17.4
  • SelectMany returning `null` crashes the generator driver #63266
    17.4
  • Does not support unicode greater than 9999 in a regular expression #63228
    17.4
  • Inconsistent behaviour with source generator results between unit testing and launch profile #63353
  • Update License for Roslyn compilers script GenerateSdkPackages to MIT #63257
    17.4
  • Allow stepping through object init blocks #63383
  • CS8600 - false positive when working with nullable values that are 'Not NULL here' #63401
  • Split Comment option in VS Tools->Options is mistakenly bound to Split String option #63309
  • Allow making attributes suppress warnings with `(Unconditional)SuppressMessage` #60938
  • Compiler warns about using not-null `string` in `ValueTuple` declared as `string?` in `switch` statement #61487
  • Analyzer Errors should not be filtered out by /p:WarningLevel=0 when Ruleset Rule is set to Action=Error #61603
  • IDE0230 (Convert to UTF-8 string literal) doesn't work #63380
  • SourceGenerator is too slow #63397

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in ref escape around missing this param #63414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add 'cancel current batch' capabilities to async-batching-work-queus. #63412
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Dont throw on null return #63267
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Install a .NET 6 runtime for the MSBuild Workspace unit tests. #63369
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Relax assert in CodeGenerator.EmitConversion() #63403
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • Improve classification test harness output #63407
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • only publish build validation logs on failure #63405
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove GenerateSdkPackages #63314
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #63354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Regression test for ref struct in iterator #63415
    Area-Compilers
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Upgrade LSP version #63341
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pass SolutionServices in more places #63398
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move DesignerAttribute scanning off of SolutionCrawler #63190
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #63197
    Area-IDE
  • Change the search of local function to non-recursive version #63338
    Area-IDE
  • Use non-recursive DFS when visit binary expression #63374
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix moving nested type to another file from an interface #63274
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix crash in parameter refactoring #63351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NodeJS projects are still built when passing /p:BuildNodeJS=false when nodejs is installed #43310
  • Perf improvement: https #43305
  • Content not being posted to textarea ASP.NET Core #43301
  • RateLimitingMiddleware test improvements #43298
    7.0-rc2
  • Swagger / OpenAPI support in gRPC JSON transcoding #43294
  • Blazor WASM MSAL authentication not working when app is trimmed #43293
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Accessing `session` within another controller - ASP.NET Core 6 Web API #43288
  • What cause error "A connection that was expected to be kept alive was closed by the server" #43287
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix, mvc #43284
  • [BlazorWasm] Too much is trimmed when not building web host #43283
    Backlog

Closed

  • Enable zero byte reads for StreamPipeReader usage in ASP.NET Core #42829
    7.0-rc1
  • QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout vs KestrelServerLimits.KeepAliveTimeout #34955
    7.0-rc1
  • Update SQL Connection String in Blazor WASM Connection to `DataSource=<value>` #42635
    7.0-rc1
  • MapHealthChecks().AllowAnonymous() not working #43042
    7.0-rc1
  • Using WithSummary() for Minimal API endpoints does not render when using Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #40753
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Localised number format and wrong input type for decimal fields #6566
    7.0-rc1
  • ASP.Net Core MVC Validation at Model Level #43244
  • Issue getting protected route to work in 6.0 but works in 5.0 #43296
  • IIS Applications hosting (in site-folder) is not working for Blazor Server deployment #43161
  • Can I auto switch blazor server to wasm when user view web pages? #43262
  • Why are methods that are not Async suffixed with Async in ProtectedBrowserStorage class? #43295
  • API additions for RateLimitingMiddleware #42667
    7.0-rc1
  • Allow direct configuration of authorization policies via endpoint metadata #39840
    7.0.0
  • Page not found after changing chtml file #43116
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template to include comment linking to doc about enabling cross-origin isolation #43194
    7.0-rc1
  • The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' because it was not found, and no other middleware handled the request. #42888
  • Upgrading a Blazor WASM project from .NET 6 to .NET 7 causes Blazor to incorrectly load .NET in Javascript #43286

PullRequests

Created

  • Follow-ups to 'Fix MVC form data binding localization' (#43182) #43309
    area-mvc
  • Update Major Version/TFM doc #43308
  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #43307
  • Add npmrc files #43303
  • Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43302
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Improve code using pattern matching #43285
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove enable HTTP/3 client option #43282
    area-runtime
  • Add QUIC event source logging to flakey test #43281
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Reuse failed auth results in AuthN #43269
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Default to zero byte reads when we use PipeReader.Create #43276
    7.0-rc1
  • Remove QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout #43250
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Avoid failed authN log when the endpoint has IAllowAnonymous metadata #43212
    breaking-change, area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Retry BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #43245
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `bbd5404` to `9044834` #43289
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5b909be` to `7274ec1` #43290
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport (Horizontal) #9446
  • Enable ContextFlyout code for iOS/Android #9445
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Border Background is not updating using VisualStateManager in iOS #9444
  • MauiIcon or MauiSplashScreen generated wrong color. #9443
  • Turning on LLVM compilation causes app crash on start up #9440
  • OnClosing Event in Windows Platform-Events or something related to it in App-LifeCycle #9439
    Backlog
  • Windows TitleBar button hover color not behaving as expected and position alignment is off when maximimized #9436
  • Shapes on Android don't support Horizontal/VerticalOptions #9433
    Backlog
  • The target "PrepareMsixPackage" does not exist in the project #9432
  • Make Microsoft.Maui.Platform.MauiWKWebView.CreateConfiguration() method to "protect virtual" instead of "private staic" #9429
    .NET 7
  • Fail to load platform specific dll at runtime. #9427

Closed

  • Can't install Release 6.0.408 on macOS #8747
  • When I try to create a handler in the client for a gRPC service HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #9430
  • AbsoluteLayout miss align on MacOS and iOS #7018
    6.0-servicing
  • Removing iOS and Android TargetFrameworks results in being unable to debug Windows #9442
  • ApplyQueryAttributes() doesn't result in UI Updates #9235
  • [WebAuthenticator] NullReferenceException on CallbackResult (Closed issue #3760) seem to come back? #9241
  • MenuBar not shown on Andoid #9421
  • Dotnet Maui fails to restore packages and build the project & throws NU1202 errors #9431
  • MAUI option is not on the VS installer #9368
  • XAML Live preview don't work on Windows build #9369
  • ShouldDismissKeyboardAutomatically Not Working #9380
  • maui-check fails on xcode and sdk for ios, maccatalyst, tvos, macos #9398
  • [BUG?] Devops pipeline release built with Maui related Error #9387
  • cannot publish Maui App with Visual Studio Publish as there is no "Client Secret" now #9340
  • Unable to create android emulator #9304
  • Visual Studio 2022 not available in this system ? #9344

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve design type converters #9447
  • Add ctors to MauiMKWebView #9441
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.3 to 1.1.4 #9435
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Add IView.EffectiveFlowDirection #9327
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [.NET 6] [Blazor] Account for Maui multi-rid builds (#9348) #9393
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move to next ubuntu #28739
  • Test ExecuteUpdate SetProperty indexer properties #28738
  • Cleanup exception message for bulk updates #28737
  • Json/Test: move all the JSON tests to relational #28736
  • Json/Query: support subquery FirstOrDefault scenario with binding to property on top of that #28733
  • bug or question for cosmos db provider about replacing an object that throw an error on a property id that doesnt exist #28730
  • Scaffold Not Building Entities With Correct Capitalization #28729
  • ExecuteUpdate/Delete on owned entity #28727
  • Test SqlQuery against all built-in types #28726
  • Not generating DbContextModelSnapshot #28725
  • How to avoid COMMIT and SAVE TRANSACTION queries? #28724
  • Compiled query support for ExecuteUpdate/ExecuteDelete #28722
  • Add debug/trace logging for why batches are broken up #28717
  • add-migration is no longer adding created migration files to project #28716
  • Json: move SqlServerValueGenerationConvention.GetValueGenerated(IConventionProperty property) JSON logic to relational #28714

Closed

  • Add a flag to opt into SaveChanges transactions even where they're not necessary #27574
    7.0.0
  • Support raw SQL Queries for basic types like Guid, DateTime and int #11624
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Run SqlClient test passes for 7.0 #25766
    7.0.0
  • Batching of statements for SELECT query #5952
  • Potential bug in CommandBatchPreparer.BatchCommands related to parameterNameGenerator #23281
    7.0.0
  • Adding many-to-many relationships without mapping table #28662
  • How can I override a MaxLength convention with an attribute? #28655
  • Using AsSplitQuery with AsNoTracking causes duplicated Included entities #28586
  • Way to omit discriminant with multiple classes(with identical properties) sharing a table #28538
  • System.ExecutionEngineException iOS Release #28710
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException when setting owned entity to modified #28675
  • Use fully qualified names in typeof() for compiled models #28674
  • Rolling back a bulk insert command doesn't work #28712
    7.0.0
  • Parameter and SQL length check don't take pending bulk insert commands into account #27840
    7.0.0
  • Scaffold-DbContext template not compatible with DbContext pooling (AddDbContextPool) #12604
    7.0.0-rc1
  • DbCommandInterceptor ReaderExecuted not firing for ExecuteReader() on command created by GetCommand() #28715

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #28732
    blocked
  • Perform structural equality in ExpressionEqualityComparer #28720

Merged

  • Json Columns query work #28171
  • Allow users to always use transactions with SaveChanges #28711
    auto-merge
  • Add python script to replace query baselines #28735
    auto-merge
  • Remove unused parameters #28734
    auto-merge
  • ExecuteUpdate: Allow using other tables in the query to generate resu… #28731
    auto-merge
  • Implement SqlQuery<T> #28665
    auto-merge
  • API review changes #28728
    auto-merge
  • Add test for parameter managed across batches #28721
  • Fix bugs in SQL Server bulk insert management #28713
    auto-merge
  • Allow parameterless constructor in addition to required constructor when using context pooling #28708
  • API review items #28709
  • Add more model validation tests #28706
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initializers #28684
